title: Extraction and complexation studies with 2,6-bis(5-(tert-butyl)-1H-pyrazol-3-yl)pyridine in the presence of 2-bromohexanoic acid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28415-28422
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05630B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jonas Stracke, Patrik Weßling, Thomas Sittel, Paul Meiners, Andreas Geist, Petra J. Panak.
Extraction studies of An(III) and Ln(III) with C4-BPP showed an excellent separation factor of SFAm(III)/Eu(III) ≈ 200 due to [Eu(C4-BPP)2(2-bromohexanoate)m](3−m)+ (m = 1–3). In contrast, Cm(III) forms significantly more stable homoleptic complexes.
